lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong’s first Giro d’Italia will begin with a team trial in Venice and finish with an individual race against the clock alongside Rome’s ancient ruins. Inside Venice’s opera house, La Fenice, race organizers unveiled a highlight-filled route for the 100th anniversary edition of the event on Saturday.
